spiritsExplanation: The "Confidence Builder Row" workout primarily embodies the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit due to the rowing activity taking place outdoors on a river, as indicated by the provided image and the nature of the workout. Lastly, there's a mild "Soothing & Restorative" element with a score of 0.5, as the workout falls under a low-intensity "breathe" category, emphasizing recovery and confidence building, aligning with a gentle, meditative approach. "Structured & Disciplined" and "High-Energy & Intense" spirits are less relevant here due to the workout's low intensity and lack of a highly structured interval protocol.
